titles.title: Veterans Hearing Benefits Act of 2018
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a presumption of service-connection for certain veterans with tinnitus or hearing loss, and for other purposes.
Veterans Hearing Benefits Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Veterans Hearing Benefits Act of 2018
This bill establishes a presumption of service-connection for veterans with permanent hearing loss, tinnitus, or both, who served on active duty in combat or in a military occupational specialty in which they were exposed to a high level of acoustic trauma.
